typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesADLS
MoviesADLS select(mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
